means: 机智的短诗，警句，讽刺诗

sentence.Network_en: After a little while, the English teacher turned off an epigram.
sentence.Network_cn: 过了一会儿, 英文老师作出了一首讽刺诗.

sentence.Network_en: Tito was ready, and scarified the epigram to Scala's content.
sentence.Network_cn: 蒂托是有准备的, 他牺牲了这首诗来满足斯卡拉.

sentence.Network_en: Suddenly a surprising image or epigram will light up the scene.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个突如其来的形象或警句突然把意境照亮.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... epidemic 流行性的 epigram 警句，格言 epilogue 后记，结尾部分.
隽语（epigram）(Epigram)读音：juànyǔ1.是名言警句的意思，即耐人寻味的言辞。2.是英语语言学分支英语修辞学的重要术语。
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... scram 紧急刹车，逃跑 epigram 警句，讽刺短诗 fogram 守旧的人.

list.abs: there is a saying in the transport business that if it flies or floats , you should rent it ( there are also much ruder versions of this epigram ) .交通运输行业内有一种说法，如果一样东西会飞或者能够飘浮，那么你应该租下它（这个警句还有许多其他更为粗俗的说法）。
To create an epigram ., 作讽刺短诗.
To express in an epigram ., 用警句表达.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French épigramme, or Latin epigramma, from Greek, from epi 'upon, in addition' + gramma (see -gram)

entry.def: An epigram is a short saying or poem which expresses an idea in a very clever and amusing way.

auth_sentence.content: The names allude to a provocative epigram of Stravinsky's: I consider music by its very nature powerless to express anything.
auth_sentence.res_content: The names allude to a provocative epigram of Stravinsky's: I consider music by its very nature powerless to express anything.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The names allude to a provocative epigram of Stravinsky's: I consider music by its very nature powerless to express anything.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表示"在……上,在……周围,在……后面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: epi在……周围+dem人民+ic……的→在人民周围→流行的
epidemiology[n.流行病学]+ical……的→epidemiological流行病学的
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+derm皮+al……的→在皮上面→表皮的
epidemiology[n.流行病学]+ist专家或人→epidemiologist[研究]传染病的学者
epidemic传染的+ology学科→epidemiology流行病学
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+gram写→写在上面的话→格言
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+graph写,刻→刻上的话→碑文
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+logu说+e→在后面说的话→后记
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+s+od路+e→在路上→一段经历;片段
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+taph墓→墓上的[字]→墓志铭

stems_affixes.value_cn: [贬低人的]短语或形容词,绰号
stems_affixes.word_buile: epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+thet放→放在名字上的另一个名字→侮辱性的称呼
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+tome卷册→[一卷书后的]梗概
epigram[n.警句,格言]+atic表形容词→epigrammatic警句的
crypto=crypt秘密+gram写,图→秘密写→密码
dia对着,交叉+gram写,图→交叉对着画→图表
epi在……上+gram写→写在上面的话→格言
gram写,图+mar→写的规则
gramo=gram写,图+phone电话机→写下声音的电话机→留声机
pro前+gram写,图→在前面写好→计划,大纲
seismo地震+gram写,图→n.震动图

means.word_mean: 机智的短诗;警句;讽刺诗

sentences.en: After a little while,the English teacher turned off an epigram.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿,英文老师作出了一首讽刺诗。
